Text:
Aw, I thought I had a couple more hours to ninja things in before you got back.

Didio is running this arc, so it should be okay.  I used to love the Challengers series back in the day.
NEVER TRY TO NINJA THE MASTER!

I can say that this book is "okay," although to be honest it isn't the greatest start to an arc.  Still, it was a great line back in the day, hopefully it doesn't get completely trashed in the new universe.
